ProjectTitle: Intensification of CO2 capture processes (CAPTIN II)
InitialFeedbackHistory:
28/06/2023
Please write your data management plan using the Flemish Standard Data Management Plan template that VLAIO requires.

To do this, use https://dmponline.be/ . Log in using your KU Leuven credentials, then "Create plan" and select VLAIO (Vlaams Agentschap Innoveren & Ondernemen) as funder to have the correct template. After you have written the plan, export it as PDF and upload it here in the DMP Monitoring Tool. 

Further guidance here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
label: not good
